name: Douglas Carl Engelbart ("Doug")
ethnicity: German (father's side), Norwegian and Swedish (mother's side)
work_institutions: SRI International,, Tymshare,, McDonnell Douglas,, Bootstrap Institute/Alliance,
known_for: Computer mouse, Hypertext, Groupware, Interactive computing
prizes: National Medal of Technology,, Lemelson-MIT Prize,, Turing Award,, Lovelace Medal,, Norbert Wiener Award for Social and Professional Responsibility,, Computer History Museum Fellow Award
